links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (15,-56,60).
formula: a(n) = 2^n/2 -9*3^n/7 +25*10^n/14. [From _Antonio Alberto Olivares_, Feb 03 2010]a(n) = 15*a(n-1)-56*a(n-2)+60*a(n-3). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 24 2013
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1 / ((1 - 2 x) (1 - 3 x) (1 - 10 x)), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 24 2013 *)LinearRecurrence[{15,-56,60},{1,15,169},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 07 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) m:=20; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/((1-2*x)*(1-3*x)*(1-10*x)))); /* or */ I:=[1, 15, 169]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 15*Self(n-1)-56*Self(n-2)+60*Self(n-3): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 24 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
